name: Hog Calls For Hog Hunting
description:
Bluetooth Compatible!

Hog calls and hog hunting calls with hog sounds perfect for hog hunting. Bluetooth compatible! The HogPro hog call app provides you REAL hog calls at your fingertips. These hog calls are clear, crisp and recorded from REAL hogs and varmints. 7 unique hog sounds included. This is the best hog calls app you will find. Connect the app to your speaker and amplifier system to play the hog calls loud and use the hog calls to bring in hog.

FEATURES:
- 7 hog hunting calls including REAL hog sounds and REAL varmint sounds
- Effective, realistic and clear hog calls
- Bluetooth compatible to sync to a Bluetooth speaker to play the hog calls
- Hog hunting calls can play in the background of your phone allowing you to text, take pictures and surf the internet without disrupting the hog calls
- The soundtracks allow you to set the hog calls and focus on hog hunting
- Connect to your speaker system with audio cables or Bluetooth (cables not included)
- No more forgetting to grab your MP3 player or memory cards, you always have your phone with you
- E-Calling audio for hog calls at a fraction of the cost of purchasing multiple hog hunting sounds and memory cards separately

Soundtracks included in "HogPro"
- Wild Hog Distress - Hog Calls
- Hog Grunts 1 - Hog Call
- Hog Grunts 2 - Hog Hunting Call
- Begging Hogs - Hog Calls
- Young Hog Distress - Hog Call
- Feeding Frenzy - Hog Call
- Hog Fight - Hog Call


Download HogPro hog calls and start having hog hunting success today!
